0x6A48B3CA.name: SET_MINIMAP_OVERLAY_DISPLAY

params.name: x
params.description: The X position for the overlay. This is equivalent to a game coordinate X.

params.name: y
params.description: The Y position for the overlay. This is equivalent to a game coordinate Y, except that it's inverted (gfxY = -gameY).

params.name: xScale
params.description: The X scale for the overlay. This is equivalent to the Flash \_xscale property, therefore 100 = 100%.

params.name: yScale
params.description: The Y scale for the overlay. This is equivalent to the Flash \_yscale property.

params.name: alpha
params.description: The alpha value for the overlay. This is equivalent to the Flash \_alpha property, therefore 100 = 100%.

0x6A48B3CA.description: Sets the display info for a minimap overlay.
